sig_info: Nova’s Medium Attacks gain up to 41.53 to 207.55 Bonus Attack Rating based on the distance travelled in the last executed dash.
At 75+ Nova Charges: Nova’s Auto Block triggers the Parry Mastery. This effect cannot interrupt Special Attacks.
The duration of Buffs is increased by 20 to 80%.

PASSIVE: When successfully striking opponents Nova has -30% Offensive Combat Power Rate.
While dashing forward, Nova passively gains up to 20% of a Bar of Power based on the distance travelled.
Nova’s Medium Attacks do not make Contact and deal Energy Damage.
Nova starts the fight with a permanent Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 58.1. If Nullified, Removed, or prevented in any way this Buff goes on cooldown for 12 seconds.
When Nova is struck with True Strike, Unblockable, or guaranteed critical hits Opponents have -70% Attack Rating.
WORLDMIND INTERVENTION: While Nova has a Fury Buff active, being struck when dashing forward activates Auto-Block allowing Nova to automatically block incoming Basic Attacks. This does not count as a Well-Timed Block. Triggering this ability removes all Fury Buffs and consumes 25 Nova Charges.
NOVA CHARGES - MAX: 100: Nova enters the fight at 0 Nova Charges and passively generates them over time. Nova Charges passively generate slower the more charges he has.
While dashing forward Nova generates additional Nova Charges. More Nova Charges are generated the farther he travels.
If struck with True Strike, an Unblockable attack, or a guaranteed critical hit, generate 50 Nova Charges.
When one of Nova’s Buffs is Nullified, remove 25 Charges, and prevent Nova Charges from being generated for 6 seconds.
NOVA FORCE: Nova’s Medium Attacks deals 30% of damage done as a burst of Energy Damage.
At 25+ Nova Charges: Nova’s Second Medium Attack deals an additional 20% of damage done as burst Energy Damage. Activating this ability consumes 25 Nova Charges.
At 50+ Nova Charges: Auto-Blocks can be triggered while Stunned. Activating this ability Purifies Stun Debuffs.
When reaching 75 Nova Charges: Gain a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 26.56 for 10 seconds and refresh Nova's active Fury Buffs while below maximum stacks. Max 4 stacks.

When reaching 100 Nova Charges: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds. This ability consumes 100 Nova Charges when this Buff expires, is Nullified, or prevented and prevents Nova Charges from being generated for 6 seconds.
Against Tech Champions, consuming Nova Charges inflicts an Armor Break Debuff reducing Armor by 400 for 24 seconds. This can only stack once.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack pauses all Fury Buffs for 3.50 seconds.
Consume 25 Nova Charges to gain an Energize Buff increasing Combat Power Rate by 30% for 7 seconds.
If activated at 75+ Nova Charges, gain a True Strike Buff allowing Nova to ignore Armor, Resistances, Auto-Block and Evade effects for 7 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Gain a Nova Surge Buff granting +100% additional Nova Charge generation for 9 seconds.

Consume up to 50 Nova Charges to deal up to 50% of damage done as burst Energy Damage with each hit of this attack. Potency of Energy Damage is increased by 100% while Nova has his personal Unblockable Buff Active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Consumes all Nova Charges and deals 0.5% of damage done as an additional burst of Energy for every Nova Charge consumed.
Re-activate Nova’s permanent Fury Buff if it is on cooldown.

PASSIVE: When successfully striking opponents Nova has -30% Offensive Combat Power Rate.
While dashing forward, Nova passively gains up to 20% of a Bar of Power based on the distance travelled.
Nova’s Medium Attacks do not make Contact and deal Energy Damage.
Nova starts the fight with a permanent Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 2075.5. If Nullified, Removed, or prevented in any way this Buff goes on cooldown for 12 seconds.
When Nova is struck with True Strike, Unblockable, or guaranteed critical hits Opponents have -70% Attack Rating.
WORLDMIND INTERVENTION: While Nova has a Fury Buff active, being struck when dashing forward activates Auto-Block allowing Nova to automatically block incoming Basic Attacks. This does not count as a Well-Timed Block. Triggering this ability removes all Fury Buffs and consumes 25 Nova Charges.
NOVA CHARGES - MAX: 100: Nova enters the fight at 0 Nova Charges and passively generates them over time. Nova Charges passively generate slower the more charges he has.
While dashing forward Nova generates additional Nova Charges. More Nova Charges are generated the farther he travels.
If struck with True Strike, an Unblockable attack, or a guaranteed critical hit, generate 50 Nova Charges.
When one of Nova’s Buffs is Nullified, remove 25 Charges, and prevent Nova Charges from being generated for 6 seconds.
NOVA FORCE: Nova’s Medium Attacks deals 30% of damage done as a burst of Energy Damage.
At 25+ Nova Charges: Nova’s Second Medium Attack deals an additional 20% of damage done as burst Energy Damage. Activating this ability consumes 25 Nova Charges.
At 50+ Nova Charges: Auto-Blocks can be triggered while Stunned. Activating this ability Purifies Stun Debuffs.
When reaching 75 Nova Charges: Gain a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 948.8 for 10 seconds and refresh Nova's active Fury Buffs while below maximum stacks. Max 4 stacks.

When reaching 100 Nova Charges: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds. This ability consumes 100 Nova Charges when this Buff expires, is Nullified, or prevented and prevents Nova Charges from being generated for 6 seconds.
Against Tech Champions, consuming Nova Charges inflicts an Armor Break Debuff reducing Armor by 537.5 for 24 seconds. This can only stack once.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack pauses all Fury Buffs for 3.50 seconds.
Consume 25 Nova Charges to gain an Energize Buff increasing Combat Power Rate by 30% for 7 seconds.
If activated at 75+ Nova Charges, gain a True Strike Buff allowing Nova to ignore Armor, Resistances, Auto-Block and Evade effects for 7 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Gain a Nova Surge Buff granting +100% additional Nova Charge generation for 9 seconds.

Consume up to 50 Nova Charges to deal up to 50% of damage done as burst Energy Damage with each hit of this attack. Potency of Energy Damage is increased by 100% while Nova has his personal Unblockable Buff Active.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Consumes all Nova Charges and deals 0.5% of damage done as an additional burst of Energy for every Nova Charge consumed.
Re-activate Nova’s permanent Fury Buff if it is on cooldown.
